# Sinan Koparan

> Sinan Koparan - PhD Candidate in Sports Data Science & AI. Research on machine learning, LLMs, and community sport analytics with CSIRO Data61 and Rugby Australia.

## Paper Extractor: AI-Powered PDF Data Extraction An AI-powered tool that extracts specific information from PDF documents. Upload a PDF, specify what information you need, and the application automatically finds it with source citations. Jan 18, 2025 Projects, AI Tools
